text: “(Shuaib) adati (kwa iye): “Ine ndikufuna kukukwatitsa mmodzi mwa asungwana anga awiriwa, chiongo chake ndikundigwilira ntchito zaka zisanu ndi zitatu; ngati utakwaniritsa zaka khumi ndiye kuti nkufuna kwako. Sindikufuna kukuvutitsa (pokuchulukitsira zaka); undipeza, Allah akafuna, kuti ndine mmodzi wa anthu abwino, (wokwaniritsa lonjezo).”
